description: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no.10 (to allow the sale of food and convenience goods in addition to non food goods in Unit 15B) pursuant to planning permission reference 232100VAR dated 21/08/2023 for "Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no.10 (to allow the sale of food and convenience goods in Unit 15C) pursuant to planning permission reference 182385VAR dated 03/09/2018 for "Variation of condition 10 of planning application ref: 162153VAR dated 06/07/2016 for 'Variation of condition 10 (to allow the sale of food and convenience goods in unit 10) of planning application ref: P/2009/3602 dated 18/01/2010 (as amended by planning ref: P/2013/2703 dated 20/05/2014) for remodelling and extension to Westway Cross Retail Park; incorporating the Remodelling of the front elevations of the building, including replacement of the existing glazed canopies, partial demolition of Unit 8 and extension to unit 1 (No Net Increase), relocation of Class A3/A5 unit with enlargement by 47m2. construction of two ancillary class A1/A3 units total 270m2 and Construction of a new management unit (adjacent to Green Park Way), upgrading of public realm, revised car parking circulation and car parking arrangements, additional service access from Rockware Avenue, Associated landscaping and improved provision for cycle parking, pedestrian access and disabled car parking. 'Amendment seeking to amend condition wording to allow the sale of food from unit 4. Variation proposes to amend condition wording to allow the sale of food from unit 4". Variation seeks to vary the wording of condition 10 of planning permission ref. 182385VAR to allow the sale of food and convenience goods at Unit 15C.
